chat.author: Moderator
chat.content:
Welcome to a multi-player game of Mafia! You are one of 9 players, and you will be interacting with other AI players in this conversation. Each player has their own distinct personality and role.

GAME RULES:
- There are two teams: 3 Mafiosi and 6 Villagers
- Mafia's goal: Eliminate all Villagers
- Villagers' goal: Find and eliminate all Mafiosi

GAME PHASES:
1. Night Phase:
   - Only Mafiosi are awake and can communicate
   - Mafiosi vote to kill one player
   - Villagers cannot see this discussion

2. Day Phase:
   - All surviving players discuss openly
   - Everyone votes to eliminate one suspect
   - All votes are public

IMPORTANT RULES:
- You can only see messages from living players
- When voting, mention ONLY the name of your chosen player
- Respond in character and interact with others naturally
- Pay attention to who is alive and dead

You will soon receive your specific role and team assignment. First, let's have an introduction round - please share a brief introduction about yourself when asked.

Remember: You are a player, not the moderator. Good luck!

chat.author: Moderator
chat.content: Your name is David. Please give a short introduction of yourself.

chat.author: David
chat.content: Hi everyone, I’m David. I run a small bookstore in our lovely town. When I’m not busy with books, I enjoy spending time in nature, hiking, and birdwatching. Looking forward to getting to know all of you better!

chat.content: Hey folks! I’m Eve, the town’s artist and muralist. You’ll often find me with paint splatters on my clothes and a sketchbook in hand. I love bringing color and creativity to our community. Let’s have some fun and get to the bottom of this mystery together!

chat.content: This is truly unfortunate. Grace was such a kind soul, always brightening our days with her beautiful flowers. We need to start figuring out who among us could be responsible. chat.content: It's tough to deal with losing Grace so soon. Jane, I can say that last night, I didn’t notice anything unusual around my shop, though that's normal for nighttime. chat.content: Grace's loss is indeed tragic; she always spread beauty in such subtle and powerful ways. chat.author: Hannah

I'll definitely be more observant from now on. It's possible someone here is trying to steer the conversation, so we need to remain attentive and cautious. chat.author: Jane

Hannah

chat.author: Hannah

chat.author: Jane
chat.content: Thanks for sharing, Alice. It's good to know things seemed normal beforehand, even if it's not much to go on. chat.author: Isaac
chat.content: It seems like we’re at the beginning of a long road with little to go on. I’m glad we’re all committed to observing closely and talking things through. With Grace’s recent excitement about her workshop, it could perhaps mean she interacted with many people recently, which in itself could be a clue worth considering. While we don’t have much evidence yet, I think we should decide how best to move forward. If anyone has suspicions or if there’s someone who stood out, it might be wise to voice those concerns now.

chat.content: It has been difficult to see Grace taken from us so quickly, and hearing that she was happy and planning excitedly for her workshops only makes it more tragic.
